title: The Things we want to keep
creator_credit: Oliver Howes, Malcolm Otton, Australian Heritage Commission and Film Australia
brief_description: Looks at many of Australia’s historic buildings, towns, aboriginal sites, parks, flora and fauna. Shows some of the restoration work that has been done and encourages people to be aware of their heritage and to start thinking about change and the environment.
